item.title: Chip stocks lead European markets higher; ASML up 4% after Foxconn revenue jump
item.description: European markets started the new trading week mostly higher Monday.

item.title: UK firms plan price rises as business confidence falls to lowest level since 2022 â€˜mini-budget', survey finds
item.description: Firms across hospitality, manufacturing, construction and healthcare expressed concerns about how they would cover additional tax costs.

item.title: S&P 500 futures rise ahead of key jobs data in a shortened trading week: Live updates
item.description: Investors are entering another shortened trading week on a wobbly note, with lingering concerns about the Federal Reserve's interest rate projections.

item.title: Elon Musk asks if America should 'liberate the people of Britain' in tirade against U.K. government
item.description: The tech billionaire and key adviser to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has taken to social media to air his grievances with the British government.

item.title: Volkswagen and Xpeng to build super-fast charging network in China for EVs
item.description: Volkswagen has ramped up its focus on China via an investment in Xpeng and an aggressive electric vehicle launch schedule.
